'''The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Defeat enemies to remove the barrier {{Enemy List|Stretchy Anemo Fungus*2;Stretchy Geo Fungus*2;Whirling Pyro Fungus*2}}
# Touch the flower to unseal the door
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Floating Hydro Fungus*2}}
# Play the [[Vintage Lyre]] in front of the nearby [[Sprouting Branch]]
# Complete the [[Valaya]] puzzle
#* For the first three, use regular Dendrograna from the [[Auspicious Branch]]
#* For the next three, use [[Healthy Dendrograna]] from the Sprouting Branch
# Ride the platform to the final room
# Defeat enemies
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Whirling Cryo Fungus*2;Whirling Electro Fungus*2}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Whirling Electro Fungus*3; Floating Dendro Fungus*2}}
#* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Floating Hydro Fungus*2;Whirling Electro Fungus*2}}
#** {{Enemy|Winged Dendroshroom|text=Cast Nightmare}} x2
# Exit domain
